title: Horticultural Vocational Skills Training for Students with Disabilities: Simulation-Based Employment Practice Model in K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of introductory horticulture concepts and proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Blended educational environment combining VR simulation and field practice, providing customized assistive tools for different types of disabilities

learning_goals: Learners can perform horticulture task management (seed selection, work scheduling) with 80% accuracy.
Learners independently complete the entire process of plant cultivation (cutting, irrigation) to packaging and distribution in a simulated environment with over 70% proficiency.
Learners adhere to 90% of safety regulations when using horticulture tools and achieve a 40% improvement in work efficiency.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
